content:
Intent1: Buying stamps. Entities - amount, collection

Intent2: Sending packages. Entities - weight, priority, size

Intent3: Sending mail. Entities- weight, priority, size

Intent4: Collecting mail. Entities- PO Box, address, name

Intent5: Submitting passport application. Entities- name, expedited

Intent6: Changing address. Entities- name, new address, forwarding date

Intent7: Purchasing money order. Entities- name, amount

Above, I have give a list of intents and entities relating to someone visiting a post office. For the following utterance, classify its intent. Multiple intents may be present. Provide the output once as a json and then also as a YAML. In the json, include every entity listed in the intent description. If the entity is not present in the text, write "None". In the YAML, however, do not include the entity slots that are not extractable in the text. Intents should only be refered to with their title (Intent1, Intent2, etc.) and not with descriptive names. 

Utterance: I'm here because I need to send this package to Florida. It doesn't need to get there fast and a standard box should take care of it. I also need to overnight this envelope. to 16 Waterton Rd. in Huntsville, OK"
